title: Number Twelve
description: Have you ever noticed how the number twelve is everywhere in our daily lives? If not, this book will quickly point out to the reader how twelves are the foundation of many of the things we count and measure.
highFrequencyWords: bend, daylight, dozen, length, measure, ruler, shadow, sundial, width
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Discriminate Initial Consonant Blend                : Discriminate initial /tw/ consonant blend
awareness: Consonant Digraphs : Identify and use consonant digraph th
phonics: Pronouns                : Identify pronouns and the nouns they stand for
grammar: Alphabetical Order                : Alphabetize words to the second letter
wordWork:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
